code: import React from'react';import{Grid2,Card,CardContent,CardMedia,Typography}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PokemonList=_ref=>{let{pokemons,onSelect}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid2,{container:true,spacing:2,children:pokemons.map(pokemon=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid2,{size:2.25,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{onClick:()=>onSelect(pokemon),sx:{boxShadow:'-2px 2px 10px 0px #00000040',borderRadius:'10px',cursor:'pointer','&:hover':{boxShadow:'0px 0px 10px 0px #00000080'}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"img",height:"100",image:pokemon.imageUrl,alt:pokemon.name,sx:{objectFit:"contain"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardContent,{sx:{padding:'5px !important'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{gutterBottom:true,variant:"h6",component:"span",children:pokemon.name})})]})},pokemon.id))});};export default PokemonList;
